model:
&types; Registration User ID User ID to use for authentication
( < authname > )
Password Password to use for authentication
( < authPassword > )
Auth ID Auth ID for authentication if it differs from User ID
( < authId > )
Display Name Name to be used as Caller ID in SIP signaling
( < displayname > )


Auto Find Registrar? FALSE If checked, the SIP registrar will be discovered automatically in the network. In such case the registrar address (defined below) if configured will be ignored
( < registrar > )
Registrar Address Domain name or IP address of SIP registrar
( < registrarAddress > )
Register to-address The field contains the address of record whose registration is to be created or updated
< registrarToAddress >
Register from-address The field is same as the Register to-address field except the third party registration on your behalf
< registrarFromAddress >
Use Domain Name FALSE If checked, the local domain name obtained from DHCP or manual configuration, is used as the domain for to-address and from-address
( < registrarUsedomainName > )
Expires (sec) 3600 The field specifies the registration duration as reported to the registrar in units of seconds
( < registertimer > )


MWI Subscribe? TRUE If checked, the phone will send MWI (Message Waiting Indicator) subscription for MWI Req URI specified below
( < mwiSubscribe > )
MWI Req URI MWI subscription Request URI
( < mwiReqUri > )


Voicemail Access Number Number/URI to access the mailbox account
( < voiceMailServerAddress > )
Call Forward Call Forward forwardonBusy forwardonNoAnswer forwardonBusyOrNoAnswer forwardAll none none If forwardonBusy is selected, all the calls will be forwarded to Call Forward Address when the phone is busy. If forwardonNoAnswer is selected, all the calls will be forwarded to Call Forward Address if they are not answered within the time specified in CFNA timer. If forwardonBusyOrNoAnswer is selected, all the calls will be forwarded to Call Forward Address when the phone is busy or does not answer the calls within the time specified in CFNA timer. Select none to disable call forwarding
( < callForwardMode > )
Call Forward Address Destination number or URI to forward the calls
( < callForwardAddress > )
CFNA Timer 20 40 60 20 Call forward on no answer timer in seconds
( < callForwardTimer > )
